PHASE SUMMARY — Mary Grant — late

Role: 
Mary is a member of the group observing Paganel's agitation and later Glenarvan's departure.

Traits: 
No specific traits are explicitly mentioned about Mary in this phase.

Relationships: 
Mary is part of a group that includes Lady Helena, Robert, and Glenarvan. She is also present when Glenarvan is about to leave.

Notable behaviors: 
Mary is described as gazing at Paganel without understanding his agitation.
